programme.title: Return to Office
programme.desc: After making the return to the office on a hybrid schedule, two coworkers known to each other only as Ms. Monday and Mr. Tuesday start sending friendly notes, sparking an office romance.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Nathan's date night leads to an undercover operation at a glamorous party; Lucas and Edie grow closer over cards; Rosemary holds auditions for a play.

programme.title: Love on the Menu
programme.desc: A popular chef rejects the idea of creating a gourmet frozen food line when the idea is presented by a food executive. But when the restaurant he runs with his wife faces financial problems, he reluctantly makes a deal.

programme.title: Love on the Right Course
programme.desc: A professional golfer suffers a series of setbacks and returns home to Budapest to reevaluate her future. While there, a golf pro helps her rediscover herself and find love.

programme.title: Anything for Love
programme.desc: A high-powered executive lies about her career on her online dating profile, while her match also hides his true identity.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Wedding
programme.desc: A meddling woman wins her sister an all-expenses-paid wedding in Beverly Hills, Calif., but soon learns her ex is also helping plan the ceremony.

programme.title: Mix Up in the Mediterranean
programme.desc: A small-town cook finds romance while impersonating his big-city twin to compete in a culinary contest.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: After the death of their father, the Dashwoods' entire world changes drastically. While one sister is torn between two men, the other is holding out hope for the man who has her heart.

programme.title: Falling for You
programme.desc: A small town's radio station manager meets her match when a visiting businessman can't seem to see beyond the screen of his laptop computer. Everything changes when she ropes him into participating in her bachelor bake-off to help save the station.

programme.title: Dater's Handbook
programme.desc: After reading a book about dating and changing her personality to find a lover, a woman realizes the man she wants is right in front of her.

programme.title: Welcome to Valentine
programme.desc: After losing her apartment and her job right before Valentine's Day, Olivia meets George, who takes her on a cross-country road trip that has them reevaluating life's priorities.

programme.title: The Lost Valentine
programme.desc: A reporter (Jennifer Love Hewitt) seeks the truth about a woman's (Betty White) husband (Billy Magnussen), a pilot who never returned from duty in World War II.

programme.title: All Things Valentine
programme.desc: A blogger who experiences terrible luck on Valentine's Day meets a handsome veterinarian. When she finds out that he's the one who's been leaving rude comments about her articles, she begins to question whether her luck has really changed.

programme.title: Paris, Wine & Romance
programme.desc: Needing to win some accolades for her masterfully made pinots, a winemaker from Oregon travels to Paris to compete in a major wine competition.

programme.title: My Secret Valentine
programme.desc: A young woman takes advice from the chalkboard notes that her mysterious tenant leaves when a slick sales rep arrives with plans to buy her family's prized winery.

programme.title: Love, Romance & Chocolate
programme.desc: On a trip to Belgium, Emma is introduced to renowned chocolatier Luc, who is in the midst of a competition to create the most romantic chocolate in Belgium for the upcoming Belgian royal wedding. A budding romance develops between the pair.

programme.title: A Paris Proposal
programme.desc: Emily and Sebastian travel to Paris to land an ad account, but soon wind up in a tricky situation when the client mistakes them for a happy couple.

programme.title: Love, Romance & Chocolate
programme.desc: On a trip to Belgium, Emma is introduced to renowned chocolatier Luc, who is in the midst of a competition to create the most romantic chocolate in Belgium for the upcoming Belgian royal wedding. A budding romance develops between the pair.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock asks Reba to help plan his father's funeral after he dies on a golf course and Barbra Jean wants the funeral a grand event and play the bereaved woman.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Since the divorce is final, a friend hooks up Reba with her old college boyfriend.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba tries to persuade Brock's doubting bride to continue with the wedding while dealing with Kyra not wanting to attend the ceremony.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba tries to reconcile with Van and his parents, but her plan backfires when his mother walks out on her husband and stays with Reba.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne signs her and Van up for Lamaze class; Reba gets into an argument with Brock when she encounters him and Barbra Jean in a childbirth class.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba ends up doing most of the work for Van's job when she insists they pay for a car given to him by Brock.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean begins childbirth, Reba searches the wilderness for the camping father-to-be, Brock.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Pregnant Cheyenne believes she won the title of prom queen only because of Van's popularity, so she refuses to go; Reba and Brock react to a high-school student who asks Kyra to the prom.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia seeks a swinging senior through the personals column; Rose can't recall an old beau who comes to visit her.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A teacher breathes life into Dorothy's decades-old crush on him; Rose makes her debut as a TV producer.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche fails to seduce her date and is heartbroken; Dorothy goes bananas over a "Beatlemania" cast member.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dreams she is a contestant on "Jeopardy!" but the game is fixed in favor of neighbor Charlie Dietz.

programme.title: Branching Out
programme.desc: To help build a family tree, single mom Amelia tracks down her daughter's biological father. It soon becomes a journey of trust, love and discovering the real meaning of family.

programme.title: Amazing Winter Romance
programme.desc: Journalist Julia goes back home to find inspiration and discovers her childhood friend has built a giant snow maze, prompting her to find her way to true love.

programme.title: Love on Safari
programme.desc: An American web designer inherits an animal reserve in South Africa. A no-nonsense ranger takes her on a safari in hopes that she will fall in love with the land, the animals and him.

programme.title: Paging Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: When an overly serious scholar attends an annual Jane Austen conference, she has a sudden change of heart when she strikes a deal with the man who's playing Mr. Darcy.
